Text: Thanks for these great stories and well read too.
Excellent stories, but (for me) they are completely ruined by the story teller. The guy reading them should go back to sport commentary and leave the audio books well alone.
I have  to agree - the stories are marvelous, but the lack of labels means you can't find the one you want, and the narrator is just awful.

I have just fixed (as best is possible) and separated all the stories into a fresh torrent.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7347642/Collected_Short_Stories_of_Roald_Dahl_(FIXED_)
